alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:03AM EDT until March 31 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations less than one inch with little sleet accumulation and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook and Northeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
